title: About True Damage Ekko
body:
You guys did a fantastic job. When I started this game there was a big lack of... SOUL in the game. Severely. Now I got mah boi Ekko dashing around the rift lookin like one of the brothas back in Philly. I truly thank you for this skin and the years of enjoyment I foresee myself having while using it!


Sincerely,

 faceless nobody playing on account # 28954368852747

replies.body: Ironic how when a fantastic skin releases you see absolutely 0 posts or praise for it, but release one 5/10 Aatrox skin and the boards with have you thinking it's the end of time.

There has been several posts praising True Damage Ekko already.
No irony there, just confirmation bias.

> [{quoted}](name=Velzard of Koz,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=f2d1KTeY,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2019-11-08T22:50:03.578+0000)
>
> There has been several posts praising True Damage Ekko already.
> No irony there, just confirmation bias.

Yea but do **any** of those posts gain the attention and votes like any of the hate threads get? I'll answer that for you, No.

Because if you don't have an issue with a skin, why would you make a whole post on it? Sure there is some good posts like this but there is rightfully so a lot more motivation for when you have a problem you want solved.

> [{quoted}](name=JustDonnyy,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=f2d1KTeY,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-11-08T22:27:03.524+0000)
>
> Ironic how when a fantastic skin releases you see absolutely 0 posts or praise for it, but release one 5/10 Aatrox skin and the boards with have you thinking it's the end of time.

This is true which is exactly why I made this thread. I'm genuinely happy to purchase this skin, a lot of work went into it and I hope the artists know it's appreciated.



That said the Aatrox skin is an abomination.

In creative dev, positive feedback is as important or more useful than negative / critical feedback at times, because it lets an artist know when they’re crushing it, and _that they should do more of that_.

Most artists (visual, writers, any medium) I know are most often their own harshest critics. Positive feedback is heard and appreciated and helps us know what players wanna see more of. 

That said, thanks for the kind words. My friends who worked on the skin worked super hard and I could not be more proud and happy for them. ❤️
Riot Pls is a great writer.
Nothing to see here, just two Michaels being wholesome.

Do you have any comment on the passive moonwalk proc not being avaliable on pbe? 

it's not being removed, is it? Is it just a bug?

ETA: This is my favourite skin ever made. Thank you.

The music being constant is an epic addition imo.

I wish Star guardian skins worked like that too...
T-T

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Pls,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=f2d1KTeY,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-11-09T07:37:35.484+0000)
>
> That said, thanks for the kind words. My friends who worked on the skin worked super hard and I could not be more proud and happy for them. ❤️

Woot my first red response. Does this mean you'll pass the praise along? Thanks!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Pls,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=f2d1KTeY,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-11-09T07:37:35.484+0000)
>
> In creative dev, positive feedback is as important or more useful than negative / critical feedback at times, because it lets an artist know when they’re crushing it, and _that they should do more of that_.
> 
> Most artists (visual, writers, any medium) I know are most often their own harshest critics. Positive feedback is heard and appreciated and helps us know what players wanna see more of. 
> 
> That said, thanks for the kind words. My friends who worked on the skin worked super hard and I could not be more proud and happy for them. ❤️

This one's great if you're into that style. 

Personally, I'm more into the fantasy elements and I'd love to see a Master Arcanist Ekko skin down the road in a few years. It's my favorite Ziggs skin too.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Pls,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=f2d1KTeY,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-11-09T07:37:35.484+0000)
>
> In creative dev, positive feedback is as important or more useful than negative / critical feedback at times, because it lets an artist know when they’re crushing it, and _that they should do more of that_.
> 
> Most artists (visual, writers, any medium) I know are most often their own harshest critics. Positive feedback is heard and appreciated and helps us know what players wanna see more of. 
> 
> That said, thanks for the kind words. My friends who worked on the skin worked super hard and I could not be more proud and happy for them. ❤️

You guys crushed it with True Damage Ekko and should do more of that. 

The walk cycle is creative and interesting, the writing is amazing and the voice actor honestly sounds quite refreshing compared to what we normally get on the rift
A friend and me would like to watch the artworks of Ekko True Damage like when Senna was announced there was so many artworks.
Sewn Chaos Amumu was ffantastic... Please. PLEASE I WANT THIS SKIN SO BAD :(

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Pls,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=f2d1KTeY,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-11-09T07:37:35.484+0000)

needs more xj9

Hey, thank you so much for the kind words! I was the narrative writer for True Damage and Ekko's in game voice lines, so your appreciation means a whole lot! And to ease anybody's worries about Akali, she didn't betray K/DA. That's still her band. "GIANTS" is a single and True Damage is a collaboration of talented, individual artists.

> [{quoted}](name=SkiptoMyLuo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=f2d1KTeY,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-11-11T20:19:11.650+0000)
>
> Hey, thank you so much for the kind words! I was the narrative writer for True Damage and Ekko's in game voice lines, so your appreciation means a whole lot! And to ease anybody's worries about Akali, she didn't betray K/DA. That's still her band. "GIANTS" is a single and True Damage is a collaboration of talented, individual artists.

I love you. You and your team did AMAZING. Thanks so much for your work and for posting!

It's okay let us hate Akali, I'm still mad she left Shen high and dry.

Yeah I accidently started a flame war over Akali when I made a joking post on the little legends video.

"KDA: Akali how could you leave us like this!?
Akali: They gave me a miniature _me_!
KDA: Okay, that's fair."

Ooc, please tell me that Qiqi is canon as Qiyana's pet!  It would be so adorable for her to have one creature that she fawns over.  Literal [Morality Pets](https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/MoralityPet) are great!

I just wanna say it was great hearing from the line writer of Ekko and then after that Thutmose replied to me on youtube. This skin went from being my favorite to actually having sentimental meaning for me. Guess this Christmas I'll be raiding the merch shop.

I love it too man. Reminds me of where I grew up. 

I just hope they do more of these skins where they're something entirely different. They're supposed to be alternate universes anyway
this board is for complaining only

he's not wrong
